DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate role clinical pharmacist development pharmaceutical care program patient Acute coronary syndrome tailor specific learn needs cultural context , verify program 's effect physiological factor recurrent symptom cardiac event .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Pharmaceutical Care Practice Patients Cardiac Rehabilitation Unit
DOC.criteria: 1 . Are diagnosed Acute coronary syndrome ( ischemic heart disease ) primary cardiologist , treat medication , percutaneous coronary angioplasty , coronary artery bypass graft . 2 . At 2079 year age . 3 . Has ability perform regular physical activity accord patient ' selfidentification judgment primary cardiologist . 4 . Willing participate study . 5 . Able reach telephone postdischarge . 1 . Patients cognitive impairment . 2 . If need professional help take medication home . 3 . With terminal illness . 4 . Inability communicate . 5 . Severe arrhythmia .
